short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily Leave Feedback and Reviews on URLs and dApps with UTU's Browser Extension. Earn Reputation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Benefits:

Connect-to-Earn: Build your digital reputation denominated in Utu Trust Tokens (UTT) by connecting your social medias to UTU Protocol

Review-to-Earn: Leave feedback and endorsements on sites and dApps, earning UTT & $UTU rewards and when those endorsements help others get good outcomes

Stay safe online with high-level summary signals from your network about sites and dAPPs you come across on the web 

Be extra sure with detailed feedback content (video, stars, text, badges) and endorsements (staked reputation) from your network about sites and dApps

Maintain control over your content, data, and relationships while providing valuable feedback to others in the ecosystem 

Future versions will allow for feedback and endorsements on all manner of assets and entities across the web

Features:

High-level summary signals in a top banner and detailed views of on-chain endorsements and reviews/feedback from your network

Modern review formats including video reviews, badges, star ratings, and text website reviews
Introducing reputation staking! Put your reputation (UTT) behind your words. You can earn additional UTT when your endorsements help others get good outcomes or be penalized your UTT when your endorsements lead others astray.

UTU's Review-to-Earn Value Proposition that rewards positive outcomes of transactions informed by endorsements/content

Initial reward pool of 300 million $UTUs will fund $UTU rewards until $UTU query fees reach critical mass

Built on Polygon Blockchain

Install the UTU Browser Extension now and help create a safer and more trustworthy web3! 

With UTU's Review-to-Earn Value Proposition, you can build your digital reputation and earn UTT rewards while providing valuable feedback to others. Don't wait - start building your digital reputation today with the UTU Browser Extension.

Built with ❤️ in Kenya

Required*
To install and access all the features on the UTU browser extension, you will need to setup and install a web3 wallet such as Metamask or other supported web3 wallets to sign-up and start earning from your feedback and reputation.

Checkout - https://support.metamask.io/hc/en-us

1st Oct 2024 - v0.4.12 

Changed

- Removed Wallet Connect support for now, until we properly fix it.
- Hide everywhere/on this domain/on this page now working properly.

Known Issues

- Switching accounts requires disconnecting the wallet from the UTU Trust extension, reconnecting to the UTU Trust again . (fix in progress)
